O

open() - Method in class org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api.Issue
Opens this issue in the IDE.
opened() - Method in interface org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.IssueController
Called when the component returned by this controller was opened.
opened() - Method in interface org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.QueryController
Called when the component returned by this controller was opened.
openIssue(Repository, String) - Static method in class org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api.Util
Opens an issue in the Issue editor TopComponent.
openIssue(FileObject, String) - Static method in class org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api.Util
Opens an issue with the given id in the Issue editor TopComponent.
openIssue(R, I) - Method in class org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi.BugtrackingSupport
Opens in the editor area a TopComponent with the given Issues UI in edit mode.
org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api - package org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.api
Everybody who wants to get access to the NetBeans Bugtracking functionality should be interested in APIs in this package.
org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi - package org.netbeans.modules.bugtracking.spi
Everybody trying to provide own implementation of a NetBeans Bugtracking module should be interested in APIs in this package.
